summary: Hoping to foil his own gold-digging wife's plan, a loathsome businessman arranges his own kidnapping, only to realize that there are plenty of other people interested in his wealth as well.
cast: Anthony Anderson|Jay Mohr|Kellita Smith|Nicole Ari Parker|Regina Hall|Loretta Devine|Donald Faison|Leila Arcieri|Charlie Murphy|Brooke D'Orsay|Jackie Burroughs|Lisa Marcos|Roger Cross|Millie Tresierra|Rob Smith|Brenda Crichlow|Carrie Colak|Lila Yee|Nicolas Wright|Kwasi Songui|Mutsumi Takahashi|Lawrence Dane|Glenn Bang|Martin Thibaudeau|Jennifer Seguin|Randy Thomas|Larry Day|Luis Oliva|Terry Simpson|Robert Higden|Deepak Massand|Ralph Francois|Roberto Blizzard|Sean Spender|Freddy Bessa|Nicole Jones|Karina Shalaby|Julie Applebee|Jonathan Krespil|Dave Fennoy|Christian Potenza|Danny Wright|Jennifer Byrd|Christopher Dyson|Ilona Elkin|Francesco Giannini|Ingrid Hart
keywords: kidnapping|release from prison|police|nail gun|hit in the crotch
title: El rey del timo
